title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 1002.1 - Required checking account
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 1002.1 - Required checking account

State Regulations

An applicant for the guarantee of a loan by the fund shall
agree to open, and if its loan is guaranteed by the fund shall open and
maintain a separate checking account exclusively for the proceeds of a loan in
a bank insured by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation. All withdrawals
from such account shall be by checks drawn on the account which shall be
consecutively numbered, and shall bear the signatures of the two persons who
have been previously approved by the fund to sign checks on behalf of the
applicant-borrower. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
1002.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
